name: mox-lockscreen
description: Lock screen and overlay module within the Mox system

scripts.test: browserify --debug -e browserify.js -o ./test/vendor/build.js -t ractify && echo 'open http://localhost:3000' && ./node_modules/.bin/serve test/

author: Mike Gioia <mike@particlebits.com> (https://particlebits.com/)
